abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance of Beethoven's Pathetique Sonata by pianist Emanuel Ax at Carnegie Hall.

headline.main: Review: Emanuel Ax Weathers Beethoven’s Emotional Storms at Carnegie Hall

snippet: The pianist performed two popular sonatas — the “Pathétique” and the “Appassionata” — as well as three lesser-known works at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: The pianist performed two popular sonatas — the “Pathétique” and the “Appassionata” — as well as three lesser-known works at Carnegie Hall.
